posts.content:
Hello All,
I've been asked a few times to email our instructions to fit a headliner so thought I'd upload it here to help the Split Screen Van Clubbers!
I hope it's useful.
I would say that there's obviously more than one way to skin a cat and this is not the only definitive way to do it (so please don't shoot me if you have a better way!) but this is how I do it and it works.
Please feel free to add your ideas/experience (or mistakes!!) to help others.
This guide should help whether you use our kit (the best out there obviously!!) or TMI or whoever
Fitting a headliner is definately a DIYer job and not as hard as people may think.
Search Wonderland on SSVC posts for first timer's headliner fitting successes, experiences and feedback if you need a bit of inspiration.
Good luck if you give it a go and hope the guide helps a little.
Feel free to ring me for advice... before during or after fitting if it helps.
All the best
Chris
